description: Change the `hugoSymbol` path parameter to a valid Hugo symbol 'TP53' but simulate a scenario where the canonical transcript is deprecated or retired and thus cannot be fetched, e.g., the transcript ID is known but flagged as deprecated in business logic, resulting in a 4xx error.

relevant_endpoints:
#### fetchCanonicalEnsemblGeneIdByHugoSymbolGET
- Method: GET
- Path: /ensembl/canonical-gene/hgnc/{hugoSymbol}
- Parameters:
  - name: hugoSymbol
  - in: path
  - required: True
  - description: A Hugo Symbol. For example TP53
  - type: string
- Request Body Schema:
None
- Responses:
{'200': {'description': 'OK', 'content': {'application/json': {'schema': {'required': ['geneId', 'hugoSymbol'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'geneId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Ensembl gene id'}, 'hugoSymbol': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Approved Hugo symbol'}, 'synonyms': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Hugo symbol synonyms', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}, 'previousSymbols': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Previous Hugo symbols', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}, 'entrezGeneId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Entrez Gene Id'}}}}}}}
#### fetchCanonicalEnsemblTranscriptByHugoSymbolGET
- Method: GET
- Path: /ensembl/canonical-transcript/hgnc/{hugoSymbol}
- Parameters:
  - name: hugoSymbol
  - in: path
  - required: True
  - description: A Hugo Symbol. For example TP53
  - type: string
  - name: isoformOverrideSource
  - in: query
  - required: False
  - description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot
  - type: string
  - default: uniprot
- Request Body Schema:
None
- Responses:
{'200': {'description': 'OK', 'content': {'application/json': {'schema': {'required': ['geneId', 'proteinId', 'transcriptId'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'uniprotId': {'type': 'string'}, 'transcriptId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Ensembl transcript id'}, 'geneId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Ensembl gene id'}, 'proteinId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Ensembl protein id'}, 'proteinLength': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Length of protein', 'format': 'int32'}, 'pfamDomains': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Pfam domains', 'items': {'required': ['pfamDomainEnd', 'pfamDomainId', 'pfamDomainStart'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'pfamDomainId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Pfam domain id'}, 'pfamDomainStart': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Pfam domain start amino acid', 'format': 'int32'}, 'pfamDomainEnd': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Pfam domain end amino acid', 'format': 'int32'}}}}, 'hugoSymbols': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Hugo symbols', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}, 'refseqMrnaId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'RefSeq mRNA ID'}, 'ccdsId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Consensus CDS (CCDS) ID'}, 'exons': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'Exon information', 'items': {'required': ['exonEnd', 'exonId', 'exonStart', 'rank', 'strand', 'version'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'exonId': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'Exon id'}, 'exonStart': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Start position of exon', 'format': 'int32'}, 'exonEnd': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'End position of exon', 'format': 'int32'}, 'rank': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Number of exon in transcript', 'format': 'int32'}, 'strand': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Strand exon is on, -1 for - and 1 for +', 'format': 'int32'}, 'version': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Exon version', 'format': 'int32'}}}}, 'utrs': {'type': 'array', 'description': 'UTR information', 'items': {'required': ['end', 'start', 'strand', 'type'], 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'type': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'UTR Type'}, 'start': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Start position of UTR', 'format': 'int32'}, 'end': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'End position of UTR', 'format': 'int32'}, 'strand': {'type': 'integer', 'description': 'Strand UTR is on, -1 for - and 1 for +', 'format': 'int32'}}}}}}}}}}

error.name: AssertionError
error.stack:
AssertionError: expected 200 to be within 400..499
   at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:1:2)
